TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Nsgan_Ray-yi, title = Nsgan_Ray-yi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nsgan_Ray-yi} }

S.FORM: Nsgan Ray-yi o mniq kska nyusan Ping-tung iyax nklaan hidaw ka nsgan Ray-yi, quri nklaan hidaw Dgiyaq paru ni mskkiyig nsgan Cing-hun ni Ta-jing nyusan Tay-tung, ryaxan hidaw o mskkiyig nsgan Sing-pini Wan-rwan, quri tghunat o yayung Li-li ni nsgan Cun-ji kla ayus, quri tgdaya yayung Wa-ru-s mggaluk nsgan Tay-wu. Emppeepix ka dgiyaq kska dxgal ni embbowngu ka dxgal kska na o niqan yayung Ri-ri ni Ray-yi ka mtqiri kana nsgan, miyah msrupu mstrung yayung Ling-peyn msqlalu Gsilung paru Taywang. Knpraan dxgal hiya o niqan 167.8m2, pusu bi hraan knkla kndsan klgan seejiq Paywang. Ris Pusu nsgan hini o klgan seejiq Paywang Seejiq Tnpusu Taywang, niqan War-ya(RAVAL) ni Pu-cawr(BUTSUL)dha paru klgan seejiq. Klgan seejiq War-ya o mkgarang mniq nsgan San-ti-mun nyusan Ping-tung. Klgan seejiq Pu-cawr do mkgarang mniq kska nsgan (Tay-wu, Ma-cya, Ray-yi) nyusan Ping-tung. nsgan Ray-yi o klgan seejiq Pu-cawr. Klwaan Man-cing siida o nAlang Paru Tay-nan nyusan Hung-san han. Knlwaan Nihung do A-hu-ting da. Kiya duri ni hnkawas 35 hngkawas 1 idas mniq smudal alang Ray-yi phiyug Qpahan nsgan, thangan nsgan Ray-yi. 39 hngkawas siida, Qpahan nsgan thjil alang I-ring, bitaq 44 hnkawas pxal thjil alang Ku-row duri. Yaasa msriqu bi daan ka elug mndha thjil ka Qpahan nsgan bitaq sayang. Llingay dxgal Hniygan dxgal Pusu nsgan hini o quri ryaxan hidaw Paru dgiyaq, mhiyang balay, niqan dgiyaq Ta-wu, dgiyaq Ray-se, dgiyaq Paw-hu-i, dgiyaq Pjing-riyu-su, dgiyaq Pa-ri-ya-ku, kmpraan dha o hmrinas 300 qnjilsan, paru bi knhrus na ni msriqu bi ka elug, mtalux ka bgihur pnskarat na.Yaasa paru bi dgiyaq ni mqguq bi ka ayug, aji lala ka qnyuxan kingal hnkawas, wana paah 6idas bitaq 10 idas ka niqan hari quyux, 1 idas bitaq 5 idas do ini quyux ni mdngu kana ka dxgal. 5 idas bitaq 9 idas pnskarat Bgihur paru kida, manu saw kiya ni msriqu bi phmaan pnegalang. Knkla elug qsiya Pusu nsgan hini o niqan yayung Ray-se, yayung Wa-ru-s, yayung Cing-Taw-wi, yayung Li-li ni yayung nbuyu. Pusu bi o yayung Ling-ping, pnaah nsgan Tay-wu dgiyaq Ta-wu quri iyax tgtruma ryaxan hidaw, yayang Wa-ru-s tgbaraw kiyi hakaw I-ta paah nklaan hidaw msqlalu yayung Ray-se pseupu ni mquri iyax tgtruma ryaxan hidaw, babaw na sriyu kiyig hakaw Tan-ling mquri iyax tgtruma ryaxan hidaw. Ptyusan nniqan qqpahan euda Ku-ru alang Ku-ru (Kuljaljau) Wan-cya alang Wan-cya (Vungalid) Kaw-ceyn alang Nan-hu(Takamimura) Pey-ru (Payljus) Tan-ring alangTan-ring (Calasiv) Siru-hwa-hwa-wu (Siljevavav) Yi-ring alang yi-ring (Tjanaqasiya) Ta-hu(Tjuwaqau) Wun-re alang Wun-re (Pucunug) Nyisu/Rsay-yialangt Ray-yi(Tjaljaqavus) Babaw smliqan paru bgihur 88, alang(nklaan hidaw ni ryaxan hidaw Ray-yi, Yi-ring, Ta-hu, Si-ru-hwa-hwa-wu) knkingal alang nii o, wada thjil tbgan nan-an alang Wan-rung nsgan Sing-pi tghunat phmaan pnegalang hiya, tthangan bgurah Ray-yi sun. Khbragan seejiq Pusu nsgan hini o niqan 7.454 seejiq, snaw o 3.730, kuyuh o 3.724; kana khbragan sapah do niqan 2.243(pnspuan smpug 109 hnkawas 11 idas). Pusu snhiyan Snhiyi Teynsikyu, Kiristukyu ni hnciyan rudan dha Seejiq Tnpusu. Elug hqulan Mgriq tdruy nanak(paah tgdaya mquri tgtruma): 1.Patas 88 ni elug klwaan 3 mowsa nsgan Kan-ting patas elug nsgan 114. 2.Paah elug klwaan 3 Kan-ting 421 sriuyu ni muda wayay elug. 3.Lutut uda nyusan Ping-tung elug nsgan 114 usa dhqan Sing-pey. Paepa tdruy bahu: 1.Pyaan tdruy qrngul. 2.Mksa usa pyaan tdruy bahu Caw-cu Ping-tung(mquri usa Alang paru 3~5 spngan). 3.Paepa tdruy bahu Ping-tung patas Siyang-tan. 4.Dhqan alang Layi. Paah pusu nsgan Layi miyah 1.Mqqdgiyaq elug tdruy bahu patas 185 quri Kn-tin. 2.Hmrinas alang Hay-hun-ryaw, slagu musa Ping-tung patas elug mquri alang Wan-rung(Ptasan tgbilaq wan-rung). 3.Tduwa qtaan ka quri narat pusu alang da. Ptasan Ptasan tgbaraw nyusan Ping-tung nsgan Ray-yi sbiq ptasan tgska Ptasan tgbilaq ptasan tgbilaq Ray-yi nsgan Ray-yi nyusan Ping-tung ptasan tgbilaq Wun-ru nsgan Ray-yi nyusan Ping-tung ptasan tgbilaq Nan-hu nsgan Ray-yi nyusan Ping-tung ptasan tgbilaq Ku-ru nsgan Ray-yi nyusan Ping-tung ptasan tgbilaq Wan-cya nsgan Ra-yi nyusan Ping-tung Saan rmigaw qmita ni Dnuuy knkla kndsan Smapuh 5 hnkawas alang Ku-ru klgan seejiq Paywang Hakaw wiwil Tan-ling, tglaq Tan-ling Gsilung snalu seejiq alang paru Ta-caw(dalih alang Ku-ru, mniq kska nsgan Sing-pey) Tglaq ayug Ta-hu Paru gbiyuk Lay-yi Smudal alang Wan-cya ni Wun-ru hnici rudan(ini hrah na) Ayug blnga hnang Wan-cya. Ayug klaway Wun-ru Smudal alang Ku-ru hnici rudan(ini hrah na) Elug ksaun dgiyaq Ku-ru Dgiyaq Pung-ci Sapah dnuuy tnpusu seejiq Paiwan nsgan Ray-yi nyusan Ping-tung Hsyu Ar-hun Sapah smapuh smalu risuh dqras seejiq alang smudal Wan-cya klgan seejiq Paiwan Kiyi emu Taywang skuan qnqaya hisyu Ar-hun ni qhuni Taw-hwa-sin-mu phmaan Nyaw-ci-shing-ping. Uqun ini kndka masu suyang sari trabus bunga jiyuling A-bu-ra-gi sungut Ci-na-hu( uqun smiyan klgan seejiq Paiwan, mangal masu, siyang, emu sari lbung rnabaw ni bkiyun bhngil. Hpuyun mhada do tduwa uqun da).

Nsgan Ray-yi o mniq kska nyosan Ping-tong iyax nklaan hidaw ka nsgan Ray-yi, qori nklaan hidaw Dgiyaq paro ni mskkiyig nsgan Cing-hon ni Ta-jing nyosan Tay-tong, ryaxan hidaw o mskkiyig nsgan Sing-pini Wan-rwan, qori tghonat o yayong Li-li ni nsgan Con-ji kla ayos, qori tgdaya yayong Wa-ro-s mggalok nsgan Tay-wo. Emppeepix ka dgiyaq kska dxgal ni embbowngo ka dxgal kska na o niqan yayong Ri-ri ni Ray-yi ka mtqiri kana nsgan, miyah msropo mstrong yayong Ling-peyn msqlalo Gsilong paro Taywang. Knpraan dxgal hiya o niqan 167.8m2, poso bi hraan knkla kndsan klgan seejiq Paywang. Ris Poso nsgan hini o klgan seejiq Paywang Seejiq Tnposo Taywang, niqan War-ya(RAVAL) ni Po-cawr(BUTSUL)dha paro klgan seejiq. Klgan seejiq War-ya o mkgarang mniq nsgan San-ti-mon nyosan Ping-tong. Klgan seejiq Po-cawr do mkgarang mniq kska nsgan (Tay-wo, Ma-cya, Ray-yi) nyosan Ping-tong. nsgan Ray-yi o klgan seejiq Po-cawr. Klwaan Man-cing siida o nAlang Paro Tay-nan nyosan Hong-san han. Knlwaan Nihong do A-ho-ting da. Kiya dori ni hnkawas 35 hngkawas 1 idas mniq smodal alang Ray-yi phiyog Qpahan nsgan, thangan nsgan Ray-yi. 39 hngkawas siida, Qpahan nsgan thjil alang I-ring, bitaq 44 hnkawas pxal thjil alang Ko-row dori. Yaasa msriqo bi daan ka elog mndha thjil ka Qpahan nsgan bitaq sayang. Llingay dxgal Hniygan dxgal Poso nsgan hini o qori ryaxan hidaw Paro dgiyaq, mhiyang balay, niqan dgiyaq Ta-wo, dgiyaq Ray-se, dgiyaq Paw-ho-i, dgiyaq Pjing-riyo-so, dgiyaq Pa-ri-ya-ko, kmpraan dha o hmrinas 300 qnjilsan, paro bi knhros na ni msriqo bi ka elog, mtalox ka bgihor pnskarat na.Yaasa paro bi dgiyaq ni mqgoq bi ka ayog, aji lala ka qnyoxan kingal hnkawas, wana paah 6idas bitaq 10 idas ka niqan hari qoyox, 1 idas bitaq 5 idas do ini qoyox ni mdngo kana ka dxgal. 5 idas bitaq 9 idas pnskarat Bgihor paro kida, mano saw kiya ni msriqo bi phmaan pnegalang. Knkla elog qsiya Poso nsgan hini o niqan yayong Ray-se, yayong Wa-ro-s, yayong Cing-Taw-wi, yayong Li-li ni yayong nboyo. Poso bi o yayong Ling-ping, pnaah nsgan Tay-wo dgiyaq Ta-wo qori iyax tgtroma ryaxan hidaw, yayang Wa-ro-s tgbaraw kiyi hakaw I-ta paah nklaan hidaw msqlalo yayong Ray-se pseopo ni mqori iyax tgtroma ryaxan hidaw, babaw na sriyo kiyig hakaw Tan-ling mqori iyax tgtroma ryaxan hidaw. Ptyosan nniqan qqpahan eoda Ko-ro alang Ko-ro (Koljaljao) Wan-cya alang Wan-cya (Vongalid) Kaw-ceyn alang Nan-ho(Takamimora) Pey-ro (Payljos) Tan-ring alangTan-ring (Calasiv) Siro-hwa-hwa-wo (Siljevavav) Yi-ring alang yi-ring (Tjanaqasiya) Ta-ho(Tjowaqao) Won-re alang Won-re (Poconog) Nyiso/Rsay-yialangt Ray-yi(Tjaljaqavos) Babaw smliqan paro bgihor 88, alang(nklaan hidaw ni ryaxan hidaw Ray-yi, Yi-ring, Ta-ho, Si-ro-hwa-hwa-wo) knkingal alang nii o, wada thjil tbgan nan-an alang Wan-rong nsgan Sing-pi tghonat phmaan pnegalang hiya, tthangan bgorah Ray-yi son. Khbragan seejiq Poso nsgan hini o niqan 7.454 seejiq, snaw o 3.730, koyoh o 3.724; kana khbragan sapah do niqan 2.243(pnspoan smpog 109 hnkawas 11 idas). Poso snhiyan Snhiyi Teynsikyo, Kiristokyo ni hnciyan rodan dha Seejiq Tnposo. Elog hqolan Mgriq tdroy nanak(paah tgdaya mqori tgtroma): 1.Patas 88 ni elog klwaan 3 mowsa nsgan Kan-ting patas elog nsgan 114. 2.Paah elog klwaan 3 Kan-ting 421 srioyo ni moda wayay elog. 3.Lotot oda nyosan Ping-tong elog nsgan 114 osa dhqan Sing-pey. Paepa tdroy baho: 1.Pyaan tdroy qrngol. 2.Mksa osa pyaan tdroy baho Caw-co Ping-tong(mqori osa Alang paro 3~5 spngan). 3.Paepa tdroy baho Ping-tong patas Siyang-tan. 4.Dhqan alang Layi. Paah poso nsgan Layi miyah 1.Mqqdgiyaq elog tdroy baho patas 185 qori Kn-tin. 2.Hmrinas alang Hay-hon-ryaw, slago mosa Ping-tong patas elog mqori alang Wan-rong(Ptasan tgbilaq wan-rong). 3.Tdowa qtaan ka qori narat poso alang da. Ptasan Ptasan tgbaraw nyosan Ping-tong nsgan Ray-yi sbiq ptasan tgska Ptasan tgbilaq ptasan tgbilaq Ray-yi nsgan Ray-yi nyosan Ping-tong ptasan tgbilaq Won-ro nsgan Ray-yi nyosan Ping-tong ptasan tgbilaq Nan-ho nsgan Ray-yi nyosan Ping-tong ptasan tgbilaq Ko-ro nsgan Ray-yi nyosan Ping-tong ptasan tgbilaq Wan-cya nsgan Ra-yi nyosan Ping-tong Saan rmigaw qmita ni Dnooy knkla kndsan Smapoh 5 hnkawas alang Ko-ro klgan seejiq Paywang Hakaw wiwil Tan-ling, tglaq Tan-ling Gsilong snalo seejiq alang paro Ta-caw(dalih alang Ko-ro, mniq kska nsgan Sing-pey) Tglaq ayog Ta-ho Paro gbiyok Lay-yi Smodal alang Wan-cya ni Won-ro hnici rodan(ini hrah na) Ayog blnga hnang Wan-cya. Ayog klaway Won-ro Smodal alang Ko-ro hnici rodan(ini hrah na) Elog ksaon dgiyaq Ko-ro Dgiyaq Pong-ci Sapah dnooy tnposo seejiq Paiwan nsgan Ray-yi nyosan Ping-tong Hsyo Ar-hon Sapah smapoh smalo risoh dqras seejiq alang smodal Wan-cya klgan seejiq Paiwan Kiyi emo Taywang skoan qnqaya hisyo Ar-hon ni qhoni Taw-hwa-sin-mo phmaan Nyaw-ci-shing-ping. Uqon ini kndka maso soyang sari trabos bonga jiyoling A-bo-ra-gi songot Ci-na-ho( oqon smiyan klgan seejiq Paiwan, mangal maso, siyang, emo sari lbong rnabaw ni bkiyon bhngil. Hpoyon mhada do tdowa oqon da).
